subject: Management
title: Resilience Under Uncertainty
description: Learn Resilience Under Uncertainty in one minute.

hook.text: A manager led her team through three pivots in one year. She was exhausted but her team stayed steady. How?

buildup.text: Leading change while uncertain yourself is the hardest leadership challenge. You must project calm you don't feel.

discovery.text: Resilience isn't the absence of stress. It's the ability to recover from it quickly.

twist.text: Leaders who pretend they're fine eventually crack. Authentic vulnerability builds more trust than false confidence.

climax.text: Build your support system: peers, coaches, mentors. You can't pour from an empty cup.

punchline.text: Take care of yourself first. Then you can take care of the change.

quiz.question: What is the key to leader resilience during change?
options: Building a support system and recovering quickly from stress
Never showing any vulnerability or uncertainty to the team
Avoiding all stressful situations by delegating change to others
